answers: Ans. It is necessary because banks have to submit subm it information to the RBI on how much they are lending, to whom they are lending and what interest rate, etc.

questions: Q. 4. Why do farmers require credit ? [Board Term-II erm-II,, (Set-KCG34U9 ) 2016]

questions: Q. 5. Why do banks maintain cash reserve ?
answers: Ans. Banks maintain cash reserve to arrange for daily withrawals by depositors.

questions: Q. 6. How do the deposits with banks become their source of income ?
answers: Ans. Banks charge higher interest rate on loans than what they offer on deposits. The difference of interest is the main source of income of banks.
